snippet.title: Button City: Soccer Days - Official Trailer | Women-Led Games x TGA 2024
snippet.description: Here's a fresh look at gameplay and the colorful world of Button City: Soccer Days in this trailer for the upcoming cozy soccer adventure game. Rejoin the wholesome cast of Button City as they compete in this cozy soccer adventure game. Build your dream team, plan your day, bond with teammates, enjoy action-packed soccer, and win the tournament! Button City: Soccer Days will be available on Nintendo Switch, Xbox Series X/S, PS5, and Steam.
